remarks.para: Any in excess of those required by FAR may be inoperative provided it is not powered by the Emergency DC Bus, Battery Bus, Battery Direct Bus or the Transfer Bus and not required for emergency procedures.

note.para: The left (Captain’s) VHF radio must be operative.
ACARS operative with HF and/or SATCOM operative.

placard.para: Placard near Captains Audio Select Panel "R VHF (C VHF and ACARS) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
